src:
Raih 17 Medali Kejuaraan Pospeda VIII, Bondowoso Siap Bertarung Kembali di Pospenas
05 Nov 2019, 10:00 by Sandy



Raih 17 Medali Kejuaraan Pospeda VIII, Bondowoso Siap Bertarung Kembali di Pospenas



Raih 17 Medali Kejuaraan Pospeda VIII, Bondowoso Siap Bertarung Kembali di Pospenas


KBRN, Bondowoso: Untuk kesekian kalinya, kontingen Bondowoso kembali meraih hasil membanggakan pada kejuaran Pekan Olahraga Seni Pondok Pesantren (Pospeda) 2019 yang digelar di Tretes Pasuruan sejak tanggal 1-4 November, dengan membawa pulang 17 medali yang terdiri dari tujuh emas, tiga perak dan tujuh perunggu. Hasil ini membawa Bondowoso berada di peringkat tiga klasemen dalam perolehan medali dibawah Kota Malang dan Pasuruan yang bertengger di peringkat satu dan dua.Suharyono, Ketua Kontingen Bondowoso sekaligus Kasi Pendidikan Diniyah Dan Pondok Pesantren Kantor Kemenag Bondowoso, saat dikonfirmasi RRI, Selasa (5/11/19) mengatakan, hasil ini membuktikan kualitas olah raga pondok pesantren Kabupaten Bondowoso di tingkat nasional, sehingga ke depan diharapkan olah raga pondok pesantren lebih maju pada level yang lebih tinggi.Dari perolehan 17 medali ini, selanjutnya akan masuk ke tim seleksi untuk berangkat ke Pekan Olah Raga Dan Seni Nasional (Pospenas) pada tanggal 26 sampai 31 November yang akan digelar di Bandung." Sekitar 35 orang dari Bondowoso masuk di tim seleksinya," pungkasnya.Dari data yang diperolah RRI, sebanyak tujuh emas diperoleh dari cabang olahraga lari, hadang putra, voli putri, kaligrafi dan silat. Tiga medali perak dari cabang olahraga futsal, lukis Islami dan stand up commedy. Sementara itu, tujuh medali perak diperoleh dari cabang estafet, cipta puisi, silat, futsal dan hadang.
text:
Winning 17 Medal in VII Pospeda Championship, Bondowoso Ready to Fight Again in Pospenas
05 Nov 2019, 10:00 by Sandy



Winning 17 Medal in VII Pospeda Championship, Bondowoso Ready to Fight Again in Pospenas



Winning 17 Medal in VII Pospeda Championship, Bondowoso Ready to Fight Again in Pospenas


KBRN, Bondowoso: For the umpteenth time, the contingent of Bondowoso won another proud result at the 2019 Islamic Boarding School Sports Festival (Pospeda) held at Tretes Pasuruan from 1-4 November, taking home 17 medals consisting of seven gold, three silver and seven bronze. These results bring Bondowoso ranked third in the medal table under the cities of Malang and Pasuruan which ranks first and second. Suharyono, Chairwoman of the Bondowoso Contingent as well as the Head of Early Education and Islamic Boarding School Office of the Ministry of Religion Bondowoso, when confirmed by RRI, Tuesday (11/5) / 19) said, this result proves the quality of the sports in Pondok Pesantren in Bondowoso regency at the national level, so that in the future it is expected that pesantren boarding sports will be more advanced at higher levels. National Sports and Arts Week (Pospenas) on November 26 to 31 which will be held in Bandung. "About 35 people from Bondowoso entered the selection team," he concluded. From the data obtained by RRI, as much as seven gold was obtained from the branch of sports, for men, women's volleyball, calligraphy and martial arts. Three silver medals from futsal sports, Islamic painting and stand up committee. Meanwhile, seven silver medals were obtained from the relay, poetry, silat, futsal and hadang branches.
